channel.title: Portal Id
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using a devolution 7.0 source and this may sound a bit stupid, but i'm looking for the id of a portal thats not just a little circular light coming from the ground, i want more of a gateway portal like pest control on runescape, anything thats similar or the same would be great. :P
All help is appreciated
Thanx! :)

item.title: Portal Id
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

the portals from pest control are npcs not objects and they are also only on the 377 client or higher (i think because the pest control area is only on 377 clients or above) but 6282 is a cool portal

Read full topic
